General.Name: KB SPAC 7
General.Description: FSN Co., Ltd. provides advertising and marketing platform solutions for smart mobile phones. The company was formerly known as FuturestreamNetworks Corp. and changed its name to FSN Co., Ltd. in September 2021. FSN Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: 3rd Floor, Sungwon Building, Seoul, South Korea
